sponsor.partnerMessage: Since 1957, Underwoods has been committed to quality and value. Named "Coolest Store in America" by InStore Magazine, and winner of state, national, and international design awards, Underwoods' dedication to craftsmanship and design excellence creates timeless jewelry.

posts.title: Get A Whiff Of Winter At The Little Candle Of NWA
posts.topic: Sponsored by The Little Candle of NWA
posts.content:
The Little Candle of NWA will release its winter collection during a Holiday Open House on Nov 19 from 11-5p in their Downtown Rogers storefront located at 112 N 3rd St.

  • Smells like Christmas: Enjoy cookies from Rad and Butter and Java Dudes coffee while you browse the store and smell your way into the holiday season. 
  • Smells like home: The Little Candle’s locally inspired NWA Collection will be marked down to $25 for the holiday event, so don’t miss it! 

Follow The Little Candle on social for updates about candle workshops and private events HERE.

posts.title: Northwest Arkansas Tourism Industry Seeing Major Growth
posts.content:
Arkansas’s tourism industry has seen some major gains across the state, with Northwest Arkansas at the front of the charge. 

  • Revenue: Tourism tax revenue for Benton County was $1.93m, up 60.1% from last year. Washington County collected $1.346m, a 40.8% increase. 
  • Jobs: The monthly employment average for tourism related jobs in Northwest Arkansas was 27,350 from Jan-Aug this year, up 6% compared with the same period in 2021.  

See the full report from Talk Business & Politics HERE.

posts.title: Walmart Museum Temporarily Relocated To The Ledger
posts.content:
The Walmart Museum is currently under renovation with plans to develop a more inclusive, accessible, and interactive way to tell the Walmart story. 

  • Evolving: The reinvention will result in a larger exhibit space, new educational spaces, and an enhanced rooftop patio.
  • Temporary relocated: During the renovation project, the Walmart Museum exhibit will be displayed down the road at The Ledger. 

See the full story from Walmart HERE.

posts.title: Fayetteville Seeking Input For Parks Master Plan
posts.content:
Fayetteville residents are invited to share feedback on the the city’s drafted Park System Master Plan. 

  • Map it out: The Master Plan will serve as a vision and guide for the Parks, Natural Resources, and Cultural Affairs Department’s efforts for the next 10 years. 
  • Be heard: The Parks Advisory Board and Parks Master Plan Advisory Committee will meet via zoom on Nov 16 to discuss and explain the drafted plan, and the window to provide feedback will be open to the public until Nov 23. 

Take the survey to voice your opinions HERE.

posts.title: Juniper Hill Opens Holiday Pop Up Shop At Promenade Mall In Rogers
posts.content:
More than just a one-stop-shop for all your Christmas needs, Juniper Hill Home turns shopping into a Christmas Experience. 

  • Holiday cheer: Find the perfect decor for your holiday season while sipping mulled cider, and don’t be afraid to bring the kids! They can enjoy Christmas story time while you shop. 
  • In the workshop: Check out Juniper Hill's great class opportunities like cookie baking, wreath classes, charcuterie workshops, and more. 

Learn more about Juniper Hill Home HERE.

pick.title: NWA Daily Picks
pick.content:
• Jelly filled: Duck Donuts does donuts fresher than anyone! Stop by for made-to-order donuts or have them cater your next event!*
  • Great gear, anytime, anywhere: Ozark Outdoor Gear Rental provides premium camping, backpacking, and climbing gear along with flexible delivery & pickup to suit your needs for your next adventure!*
  • Cross-country: Sarina Farb will be in NWA Nov 18 on her Vegan Van Tour sharing about living a healthy and sustainable life. Learn more HERE.*
  • U of A Smackdown: WWE’s Baron Corbin and Big E, made a stop at Arkansas as part of their “Campus Rush” recruiting program. 
  • Chancellor: Charles Robinson has been appointed Chancellor of the University of Arkansas, becoming the first Black Chancellor of the state’s flagship university. 
  • Let's talk: Interested in advertising in the newsletter? Check out our deals HERE.

*Content is sponsored
